title: FS: 1913 T200 New York Nationals Fatima Card $350 OBO
author: smotan_02

posts.post_title: FS: 1913 T200 New York Nationals Fatima Card $350 OBO
posts.post_content:
1913 T200 New York Nationals Fatima Card.  $350 obo (delivered) via paypal F&F.

Would also consider a trade for a grouping of pre-1940s sports programs.

The card is in great condition and strong borders.  It has, what appears to be, cigatette burn marks by Wiltse's shoulder and neck.  There is also a dark mark by Thorpe's knee.
